doc:
Ernestine Wade https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernestine_Wade 0 Ernestine Wade (August 7, 1906 – April 15, 1983) was an American actress who is best known for playing the role of Sapphire Stevens on both the radio and TV versions of The Amos 'n' Andy Show. Ernestine_Wade ( August_7_,_1906 – April_15_,_1983 ) was an_American_actress who is_best_known for playing the_role of Sapphire_Stevens on both the_radio_and_TV_versions of The_Amos_'n'_Andy_Show .
